ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah in asherons call, I just made new characters sold all the equipment and got alot of money fast. Its too easy in that game Fammuin, level 16 Erudite
ygData.messageBody:
yeah in asherons call, I just made new characters sold all the equipment and
got alot of money fast. Its too easy in that game

Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter, Erollisi
Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:52 AM
Subject: SV: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


> From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
> What exactly are you saying here? That you cheated or something to get
money? This was in beta right? Sorry but I don't quite follow your message
it looks pretty garbled hehe.. You mean you made new characters and sold the
newbie equipment and did this over and over again?
>
> - Avron -
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Shane Bole <shane0009@...>
> To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:48 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
>
>
> > From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
> >
> > lol before I left, I died out somewhere I didnt know and I lost my plate
> > helm. btw im a caster... hehe
> > anyways, I set out to find my corpse. then I lost my plate
wristbands....
> > then i started cursing AC, and I looked around and yelled free stuf, ran
up
> > to someone, gave him my breastplate, staff, wand, spell reagents, and
the
> > rest of my armor and hes like "wow hehe thanks" and then I said back to
EQ,
> > and let him know he can find more plate on the road in a few mins.
> > It was so easy to get the plate... exit main character, start a new
> > vagabond, sell all the stuff drop the 400 pyreals (thats what theyre
called,
> > right?) then log in as main character delete vagabond start over. I got
rich
> > doing that alot
> >
> > Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
> > Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter,
Erollisi
> > Marr
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Whitmore, Lance <lwhitmore@...>

> > > I have to agree with you on AC.. I'm part beta program, however i
rarely
> > > play it now.. its neat when you first start playing.. then you find
out
> > that
> > > the game just sucks.. :) cant put it any other way. Graphics are
ok..
> > but
> > > the world is so large and the distance between them is almost
unbearable.
> > > Its really annoying running for what seems forever, then losing your
best
> > > item you spent all your loot on miles from where you last bound
yourself.
> > > Hehe.. The AC world is so empty, almost as empty as their dungeons.
:)
> > >
> > > For those that don't know.. when you die in AC you temporary lose some
of
> > > your stat numbers and.. your best item. This item.. which is now
> > > available to anyone walking by. nice aye. EQ example... One minute
you
> > > have your rubi tunic, when you return to your corpse you find that a
level
> > 1
> > > guy is now sporting your hard earned tunic.. Welcome to AC. hehe
> > >
> > >
> > >

open

the

> > > its annoying as hell plus the graphics suck, monster AI is sucky so
you
> > can
> > > solo your whole way to the top without getting hurt for 1 point of
damage

> > > elsewhere.
> > > > Perhaps someone out there knows of another game (other than AC and
UO)
> > or
> > > > perhaps a group who's programming their own game similar to EQ? If
so,
